entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 12:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -17.8°C
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Blowing snow this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
